result.execSummary:
The defendant Kevin G. Ternes was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Child Pornography, a class D felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.12(1m).
  • Possession of Child Pornography, a class D felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.12(1m).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
2:09 PM Defendant Kevin G. Ternes appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Angelina R Scarpelli appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. The PD's office is yet to appoint counsel to represent the Defendant in this matter.  Defendant indicates that he wishes to waive his right to an attorney for the purpose of this preliminary examination today.  Court goes over his rights in order to waive the preliminary examination.  Court finds that Defendant is knowingly, voluntarily and intelligently waiving his right and allows him to represent himself for this hearing.  
Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 1 for further proceedings.
ARRAIGNMENT
Information filed.  Not guilty plea(s).  Jury Calendar.    
Minutes. 
BAIL MODIFICATION:  Court takes notice of the letter dated July 6, 2022 as basis for his request for modification. 
Defendant adds additional information.  State argues against modification and states its reasons to deny the motion.  Court finds that bail is appropriate and denies the bail modification.  State to prepare order.
Scheduling conference scheduled for September 7, 2022 at 10:50 am.
Scheduling conference on September 7, 2022 at 10:50 am.
Report from Public Defender indicating no attorney has been appointed yet.
Letter from Defendant to Judge Rohrer re: bail reduction.

Defendant in custody.   
Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.   Preliminary hearing is set for 07-13-22 at 2:00 p.m.   
Minutes.

ADDRESS INFO for Kevin G. Ternes
Current: c/o Manitowoc County Jail, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States  (Effective: 07-05-2022)
Prior: 1302A S 15Th St # A, Manitowoc, WI 54220
Re:  Possess child pornography, between 05-26-22 - 06-30-22.
Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crime of 3 cts. possess child pornography.  The matter is continued for initial appearance on 07-05-22 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $5,000.00 cash bond with the conditions that defendant is to have no contact with anyone under the age of 18 and defendant is not to use or possess any internet enabled devices.  Bail not furnished and defendant is remanded to the custody of the Sheriff.  
Minutes.
